'''Tutorials''' are unlocked by encountering or triggering its relevant entry. Unlocked tutorials can be revisited in the [[Archive]]. Viewing a tutorial for the first time rewards {{Item|Primogem|30|x=1}}.

There are a total of {{Category Total|Tutorials|not1=Event Tutorials|not2=Uncategorized Tutorials|uses=Template:Tutorial}} Tutorials.
